attributes.action: Scrap the ineffective traffic light system, preventing those to visit back home.
attributes.additional_details: It is keeping people away from home, they also have a limited amount of money they can/want to spend in order to visit family.
attributes.background:
Investigate how ineffective the traffic light system is, eventually finding a new system which is helping decrease the amount of covid cases.
Also allow those to quarantine at home instead of at a hotel.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing travel restrictions, but it's not clear if you want the Government to investigate the current system and develop a new system to replace the current one, or to scrap all restrictions then develop a new system.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072

Fund free hotel quarantine and testing for all UK arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612

Do not enforce mandatory hotel quarantines for international arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571682

Review quarantine rules for international arrivals travelling for work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574771

Publish criteria for allocating countries to red, amber and green lists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587003
